snippet.title: Path of Titans: Gondwa Gameplay Trailer - Featuring Robert Irwin
snippet.description:
Explore the new land of Gondwa in this open world MMO where you get to be the dinosaur. Narrated by Robert Irwin

Gondwa ► Kaiwhekea ► Thalassodromeus

Available Now! On PC, mobile and consoles!

Enter the prehistoric paradise of the Gondwa islands.  Dive through undersea canyons as the first fully aquatic character, the plesiosaur Kaiwhekea, and catch thermal updrafts to carry high into the skies as the first pterosaur, the Thalassodromeus!

The world of Path of Titans has expanded in many ways, new underwater home caves and quests, new aquatic NPCs, improved teleporting from Waystones, and towering cliffs and peaks for your Kais to call home. Discover the hidden caves and burrows above and below the ocean blue, and interact with the many new denizens of the seas.  

With 100+ player servers, and now 30 dinosaur species to play in the official roster, choose a new adventure every day in your ‘Play as the dinosaur” survival sandbox Path of Titans.
